articles.title: Raging wildfire kills one, threatens Northern California city of Redding
articles.description: The Carr Fire in Shasta County killed a bulldozer driver and was licking at the edges of a city of 92,000 people, authorities said.

articles.description: McCaskill, who is one of the most vulnerable Democratic senators up for re-election this fall, said in a statement she  "will not be intimidated" and that Vladimir "Putin is a thug and a bully."

articles.description: The Ohio Republican said he would run to replace Paul D. Ryan, even as he has been embroiled in a scandal from his days as a college wrestling coach.

articles.author: Steve Almasy, CNN
articles.title: Georgia cops who arrested woman after appearing to use coin flip app are fired
articles.description: Two police officers in an Atlanta suburb who appeared to use a coin-flip phone app before one of the cops arrested a woman for reckless driving have been fired, Roswell police said Thursday.
